ModMetaData.name: Industrial Defense Turrets
ModMetaData.author: Grandyy
ModMetaData.description: Add 5 (what I think is) industrial style turrets and mortars.Fire explosive shells or bullets. Thing list: Security Buildings: Rocket Artillery Auto Defense Turret Towed Artillery Position Auto Blaster Position Field Gun Position Items: Uranium Alloy Shell (as ammo for new turrets) I may add more stuff in the future.
